body: "The OCM Bocas Prize for Caribbean Literature — which will be awarded for the first time this year — has announced its 2011 longlist of ten books": Caribbean bloggers discuss.
original_body: "The OCM Bocas Prize for Caribbean Literature — which will be awarded for the first time this year — has announced its 2011 longlist of ten books": Caribbean bloggers discuss.
title: Caribbean: Bocas Announces Longlist
